item.description:
Black and White
at Huron Ave, Friday
Swing City regulars, featuring guest artist Dave Howard from "Roomful of Blues". Specializing in catering to the swing dancing crowd, "Black & White" have performed at the prestigious BOSTON BLUES FESTIVAL, and have had the honor of sharing billing with some of music history's top performers. Nominated in the 2000, 2002, 2003 & 2005 PROVIDENCE PHOENIX BEST MUSIC POLL - Best Blues/R&B Act Category.

 

 

Entrance Fee - $16.00 for the whole night.   I may be able to get us a group discount - keep your eyes peeled.
item.name: Swing Dance with Black & White
